title: The Path of Many Choices
subtitle: Else If Statements
hints: In C#, use && for AND (not 'and' like Python)
Use || for OR in C# (not 'or' like Python)
The first condition needs BOTH strength >= 15 AND intelligence >= 15
Order matters! The most specific conditions should come first
Remember: conditions in ( ), code in { }, statements end with ;
learningObjectives: Use else if for multiple condition checking
Combine multiple conditions with logical operators
Make decisions based on complex criteria
Use proper C# logical operators (&& and ||)
